name: azapropazone
content: Azapropazone  is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It is manufactured by Goldshield under the tradename Rheumox.  It was available in the UK as a prescription-only drug, with restrictions due to certain contra-indications and side-effects. Azopropazone has now been discontinued in the British National Formulary. Azapropazone has a half-life of approximately 20 hours in humans and is not extensively metabolized.   == References ==
